title: Cyclistic Bike-Share Analysis
content: Analyzed bike-share data to determine patterns in usage between casual riders and annual members and to provide actionable insights to improve marketing strategies.

title: AutomatiData
content: Built a data pipeline automation system that extracts, cleans, and loads large datasets into a data warehouse for easy analysis and reporting.

title: Tiktok Claims Classification
content: Created a machine learning model to classify Tiktok claims based on specific criteria to aid in content moderation and filtering.

title: Customer Segmentation
content: Developed a customer segmentation model using clustering techniques to identify distinct customer groups and tailor marketing strategies.

title: Sales Analysis Dashboard
content: Built an interactive dashboard that visualizes key sales metrics, allowing for better business decision-making.

title: Waze Customer Churn Analysis
content: Analyzed customer churn data from Waze to identify key factors contributing to churn and provide insights for customer retention strategies.

title: Student Management System
content: Developed a full-stack web application for managing student records, including attendance, grades, and personal details.
